description: The switch sends this notification when an SNMP
SET command fails at the authorization check stage.
This notification applies to SETs within the hpicf tree that
are network security related. This object is controlled
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HP-ICF-SNMP-MIB::hpicfSnmpAuthFail HP-ICF-SNMP-MIB::hpicfSnmpAuthFailCount c 9999 HP-ICF-SNMP-MIB::hpicfSnmpAuthFailIPType i 0 HP-ICF-SNMP-MIB::hpicfSnmpAuthFailIP s EXAMPLE

description: A count of SNMP authorization failures detected by the SNMP entity.
variables.name: HP-ICF-SNMP-MIB::hpicfSnmpAuthFailCount

description: Type of IP address contained in hpicfSnmpAuthFailIP.
variables.name: HP-ICF-SNMP-MIB::hpicfSnmpAuthFailIPType

description: IP address of sender of message that failed authentication.
variables.name: HP-ICF-SNMP-MIB::hpicfSnmpAuthFailIP
